PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04002018-04-03,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedules I and IV to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULES I AND IV TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (2) correct typographical or grammatical errors; (3) modernize obsolete references and archaic language; and (4) add clarity to regulatory provisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0070 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Schedules I and IV to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Order Amending SCHEDULES I AND IV TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (2) correct typographical or grammatical errors; (3) modernize obsolete references and archaic language; and (4) add clarity to regulatory provisions.
